job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement and maintain reliable, scalable and backend services
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the core activities of building and maintaining software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Closely collaborate with our Research teams to bring the new functionality of their models to our end users via new features and integrations
job_tasks.justification: This indicates working with models developed by research teams and integrating their functionality, which aligns with the 'adapting models' aspect of TASK3.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to monitoring and debugging the services in production, e.g. by defining expressive metrics and ensuring expressive logs
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring, debugging, and defining metrics for production services are key components of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate across teams to define shared interfaces and ensure smooth operation in production
job_tasks.justification: Defining interfaces and ensuring operational smoothness across teams are standard software development practices for integration and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about
job_tasks.justification: While not explicit about model development, 'hacking sessions' focused on projects suggests exploration and potential model experimentation, aligning with the broader scope of TASK3.

soft_skills.phrase: Closely collaborate with our Research teams
we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing and maintaining backend services and integrating models from research teams. While it mentions 'models', it lacks specific details about generative AI techniques or frameworks, leaning more towards traditional software development and operational aspects of AI model integration rather than core generative model engineering.
